format: A data frame with 8 observations and 4 variables.

parameters.supervisor:
factor indicating supervisor's job satisfaction
(low, high).
parameters.management:
factor indicating quality of management (bad,
good).
parameters.own:
factor indicating worker's own job satisfaction (low,
high).

title: Job Satisfaction Data
description:
Description
Data from Petersen (1968) about the job satisfaction of 715 blue
collar workers, selected from Danish Industry in 1968.
reference:
E. B. Andersen (1991),
The Statistical Analysis of Categorical Data, Table 5.4.
